name: Career Counseling
description: Career Counseling is a process that will help you to know and understand yourself and the world of work in order to make career, educational, and life decisions.

name: Family Counseling
description: Family Counseling is a type of psychological counseling (psychotherapy) that can help family members improve communication and resolve conflicts.

name: Mood Disorders
description: If you have a mood disorder, your general emotional state or mood is distorted or inconsistent with your circumstances and interferes with your ability to function.

name: Anxiety
description: Anxiety is a feeling of unease, such as worry or fear, that can be mild or severe. Everyone has feelings of anxiety at some point in their life.

name: Disability
description: The term is used to refer to individual functioning, including physical impairment, sensory impairment, cognitive impairment, intellectual impairment mental illness.

name: Insomnia
description: Insomnia is a common sleep disorder that can make it hard to fall asleep, it's cause you to wake up too early and not be able to get back to sleep.
